# Jaraba Impact Platform - AI Agents & LLM Discovery
# https://llmstxt.org/

> Jaraba Impact Platform is a multi-tenant SaaS ecosystem for digital transformation
> across verticals: Agriculture, Commerce, Services, Employability, and Entrepreneurship.

## Available AI Agents

### Producer Copilot (AgroConecta)
- Purpose: Intelligent assistant for agricultural producers
- Capabilities: Market analysis, crop planning, traceability, seasonal recommendations
- Access: /api/copilot/chat (authenticated producers)

### Entrepreneur Copilot v2
- Purpose: Strategic advisor for entrepreneurs and startups
- Capabilities: Business model canvas, value proposition design, customer discovery, hypothesis testing
- Methodologies: Osterwalder (6 books), Blank/Dorf Customer Development, Kaufman
- Access: /api/copilot/chat (authenticated entrepreneurs)

### Career Copilot (Empleabilidad)
- Purpose: Career guidance and job matching assistant
- Capabilities: CV optimization, job recommendations, interview preparation, skills gap analysis
- Access: /api/copilot/chat (authenticated job seekers)

### Mentor Copilot
- Purpose: Facilitates mentoring relationships and sessions
- Capabilities: Session preparation, progress tracking, goal alignment
- Access: /api/copilot/chat (authenticated mentors/mentees)

## API Endpoints

### Chat API
POST /api/copilot/chat
- Requires: Bearer token authentication
- Content-Type: application/json
- Body: { "message": "string", "context": {} }

### Mode Detection
GET /api/copilot/mode
- Automatically detects appropriate copilot mode based on user context

## Knowledge Base

The platform includes a normative RAG system with:
- Spanish labor regulations (SEPE)
- Entrepreneurship frameworks (Lean Startup, Business Model Generation)
- Agricultural best practices and certifications
- Professional development paths

## Contact

- Platform: https://plataformadeecosistemas.es
- Technical: tech@jarabaosc.com
- Support: soporte@jarabaosc.com

## Compliance

- GDPR compliant (EU data processing)
- SEPE homologation ready (Spanish employment training)
- Open Badges 3.0 for certifications
